Package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap

This package defines the API and base classes for the objects that are used to import or export LDAP directory entries to or from DSML and LDIF file formats.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FormatHandler
    The interface that is implemented by objects that handle the DSML and LDIF file formats.
    FormatLogger
    The API used by FormatHandler, FormatReader and FormatWriter implementations to log information and error messages.
    FormatReader
    Implemented by objects that read change records from DSML or LDIF files.
    FormatWriter
    Implemented by objects that write directory entries to DSML or LDIF files.
    LDAPServer
    The interface that must be implemented by LDAP servers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFormatHandler
    Abstract base class for FormatHandler objects that import/export directory entries to/from LDAP directory servers in LDIF and DSML format.
    AbstractLDAPServer
    Abstract base class for LDAPServer implementations.
    AddRequestMatcher
    Used to match AddRequest.
    FormatTestUtils
    Helper methods used by test cases.
    TestAbstractLDAPServer
    Unit test the abstract base class for the directory server implementations.
    TestUtils  

Package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap Description

This package defines the API and base classes for the objects that are used to import or export LDAP directory entries to or from DSML and LDIF file formats.
